<script type="text/javascript" src="ajax.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://edwards-opensocial.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ws.js"></script>

<script language="Javascript" type="text/javascript">
//http://ws.nmpdr.org/FIG/wsdl_seed.cgi
//http://seed-viewer.theseed.org/SeedWebServices#get_translation
peg = "fig|83333.1.peg.1345";

function request() {  
  var params = {};
  var url = "http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/eutils/efetch.fcgi?db=pubmed&id=ids&retmode=xml&tool=pubmedbrowsergadget";
  gadgets.io.makeRequest(url, response);
};

function response(obj){
alert(obj.text);
}

request();


document.write(peg);
</script>
